extendedInfo.description: The Drexel University U.S. Constitution App is targeted for use by incoming freshman to the University but is open for anyone to use.  Through this new electronic initiative created by the Office of Government and Community Relations, the Center for Civic Engagement and the Goodwin College of Professional Studies, you will have the opportunity to learn more about the history of the constitution and view of it.The Constitution contains the basic laws of the United States in its seven articles and 27 amendments. The ideas on which America was foundedâcommitments to the rule of law, limited government and the ideals of liberty, equality and justiceâare embodied in the document.  We hope that increased knowledge of this important document will help to further your understanding of the United States and promote civic engagement.
